#115 0' 3.9"
132.38 lbs. 		Magnet Pokémon It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. It generates powerful radio waves that raise temperatures by 3.6 degrees F within a 3,300-foot radius.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Magnet Pull 9 Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
1 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
18 Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
36 Quark Drive 3 Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain.
54 Analytic 6 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
72 Levitate 8 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
90 Short Circuit 5 The Pokémon creates a thunderstorm when it's hit by an attack.
100 Hadron Engine 10 Generates Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters. Boosts Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 24 Levitate 8 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 36 Quark Drive 3 Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain.
Disc 38 Compound Eyes 8 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Analytic 6 Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Battery 2 Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Carbonize 8 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Clear Body 5 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Download 8 Raises the Pokémon's offensive stat an opposing Pokémon is the weakest to.
Electromorphosis 2 The Pokémon becomes Charged up when it takes damage.
Full Metal Body 7 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Hadron Engine 10 Generates Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters. Boosts Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
Heavy Metal 3 Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Irradiated 5 The Pokémon generates a solar wind when it's hit by an attack.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Light Metal 2 Halves the Pokémon's weight.
Magnet Pull 9 Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
Minus 1 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Mirror Armor 9 Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
Motor Drive 7 Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Plus 1 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Prism Armor 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Protosynthesis 3 Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or solar wind.
Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Short Circuit 5 The Pokémon creates a thunderstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
Steelworker 7 Powers up Steel-type moves.
Surge Surfer 6 Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
Transistor 4 Powers up Electric-type moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Volt Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a thunderstorm.
Electric Surge 9 Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Pressure 6 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Shrapnel Surge 9 Turns the ground into Shrapnel Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
